projects.name: Flash-Chat
projects.description: Crafted with Flutters dynamic framework and Firebases backend, this chat application offers seamless communication experiences. Tools & technologies used: Flutter, Dart, Firebase, With sleek UI/UX design involving animations and real-time messaging, users can effortlessly connect and share.

projects.name: StockSavvy
projects.description: A Django-based store management system simplifying inventory control and sales tracking. Tools & technologies used: Python, Django Streamline operations and optimize stock management effortlessly.

experiences.description: Building and improvising complete applications using flutter and key features of firebase. Learning and implying complex usage of BLOC state management.
Built flutter applications and conceptualized usage of Rest API. Learnt about Google ml kit and its importance in building ai apps.
